text: "Witch Hunt" is a 1981 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush and is the sixth track to their eighth studio album Moving Pictures. It was the B-side to their hit single Tom Sawyer and the song is all about their home country of Canada. It has been played live on their concerts. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Rush (band) songs
title: Witch Hunt (Rush song)
